text: Genopole is a biocluster in France for biotherapies, research in genetics, genomics, post-genomics and for biotechnology companies.«En 15 ans, Genopole est devenu le premier biocluster français» It is located in Évry- Courcouronnes. In 2018, the Genopole has 17 academic research laboratories, 87 biotechnology companies, as well as 20 scientific platforms shared with the University of Évry Val d'Essonne.Genopole reçoit de l’AURP le prix de parc de recherche d’excellence == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Genetics Category:Évry-Courcouronnes Category:2002 establishments in France
title: Genopole
